programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep716
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep492
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep2122
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop is assigned to escort an important witness from the Philippines, only to find himself teaming up with a local cop to bring down a wicked crime syndicate.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: The 42nd Hong Kong Film Awards Red Carpet
programme.desc: Stars and celebrities hit the red carpet ahead of the Awards Ceremony, showing off their best and brightest looks for one of Hong Kongs biggest nights. Follow our live coverage as the superstars deliver their glamourous styles!

programme.title: The 42nd Hong Kong Film Awards
programme.desc: CMM proudly brings you the live coverage of the 42nd Hong Kong Film Awards. Stay tuned and support Hong Kong films!

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chans first major movies) for an evocative and terrific Martial arts world adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller; playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the speed gang, led by Johnny, and Kuos sister Carrie is molested by Johnnys brother Michael. Kuos family continues to be harassed by the speed gang while on the island can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Coffee
programme.desc: A woman, who aspires to be a cop, looks after her brother after their parents died at a very young age. Later, she searches for him desperately when the latter gets abducted.

programme.title: Ellaam Mela Irukuravan Paathuppan
programme.desc: A young man gains superpowers after receiving a strange object from an alien planet. However, he is not sure if the aliens want to retake it or enable him to do good.

programme.title: R.K.Nagar
programme.desc: A righteous man from humble origins finds himself embroiled in a high-profile murder case after falling for a politician's daughter.

programme.title: Appatha

programme.title: Saakshyam
programme.desc: A gang of thugs commit mass murder and are sure that they escaped it without facing any consequences. However, they are unaware that a toddler has managed to escape their heinous crime.

programme.title: Om Shanti Om
programme.desc: Om, a junior film artist, is smitten by Shantipriya, a renowned actress, but is killed while trying to save her from a fire accident. Thirty years later, he is reborn and sets out to avenge her death.

programme.title: Budhia Singh - Born To Run
programme.desc: Five-year-old Budhia Singh, the world's youngest marathon runner, attains glory and garners attention from all around the world. However, his coach soon faces backlash for unethical training.

programme.title: Sau Din Saas Ke
programme.desc: Durga gets married in a household that is dominated by her mother-in-law. The old lady is a greedy taskmaster who shows no love, but Durga aims to teach her a lesson in humility and win her heart.

programme.title: Ek Jaanbaaz Police Officer
programme.desc: Bharat, a patriotic and an honest police officer, is a force to reckon with for the criminals. When Simhadri, a gangster, threatens the peace of the state, Bharat decides to put an end to his violence

programme.title: Chhote Sarkar
programme.desc: Amar, a rich businessman, is framed by two undercover police officers, Seema and Jagmohan, for the murder of his uncle. To evade prison, he claims to be of unsound mind and tries to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Shimla Mirchi
programme.desc: Avi writes an anonymous love letter to Naina, the love of his life. However, things go awry when it lands in her mother's hand and she thinks it is meant for her.

programme.title: Mental
programme.desc: A young boy, who is jailed for killing his mother's murderers, realizes the power of the uniform and grows up into a ruthless but honest cop. Trouble arises when he locks horns with a powerful goon.

programme.title: Shriman Shrimati
programme.desc: A rich and wealthy couple, Shankarlal and Parvati are horrified at the household problems prevalent around them. As a result, they decide to fix these broken families one at a time.

programme.title: Shriman Shrimati

programme.title: Thackeray

programme.title: Kaalia
programme.desc: Kallu's life changes after his brother, Shamu, meets with an accident and requires money for his treatment. As a result, he is forced to rob Shamu's employer but gets arrested instead.

programme.title: Shimla Mirchi
programme.desc: Avi writes an anonymous love letter to Naina, the love of his life. However, things go awry when it lands in her mother's hand and she thinks it is meant for her.

programme.title: Kadamban
programme.desc: Kadamban along with a group of villagers wages a war against a powerful businessman, who wants to destroy the forest surrounding Kadamban's village for his greed.

programme.title: Batman: The Doom That Came To Gotham
programme.desc: This chilling and bizarre DC Elseworlds story is a mash-up of the world of Batman and the cosmic-horror fiction of H.P. Lovecraft, creator of the Cthulhu mythos. Returning from a decade-long voyage of discovery, Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham City, where his parents fell victim to the knife of a madman 20 years earlier. On his journey, Bruce has taken on an international trio of orphaned street kids whom Batman fans will recognize as various iterations of Robin. During a deadly Arctic encounter, the Penguin informs Bruce that a doomsday cult is planning Gotham's destruction. Bruce must now return home and take on the mantle of Batman. But when this man of science discovers he faces not criminals and crazies but actual ancient magic, fiery demons and interdimensional Old Gods, can he retain his sanity?

programme.desc: Monica's will power is tested when she runs into Richard at a video store.

programme.title: Friends S3 14
programme.desc: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner. Rachel's new job is putting a strain on her relationship with Ross.

programme.title: Friends S3 15
programme.desc: Ross seeks solace at a party after a bitter fight with Rachel and ends up in the arms of another woman. First of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Friends S3 16
programme.desc: When Rachel discovers that Ross slept with Chloe, she decides to break up with him. Second of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 7
programme.desc: Meet Sheldon Cooper in childhood, as he embarks on his awkward and hopeful journey toward the man he will become.

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: When Miami's top mob enforcer discovers his femme-fatale boss has branched out into cyber-sex trafficking, he decides to sacrifice everything to save a young runaway teenager.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 1
programme.desc: At the port of Los Angeles, Uzi and Shlomi are out to destroy the competition. First, Uzi drives prices through the roof, causing complete chaos on the auction floor. Then, Shlomi plays a hunch on a mysterious container from China that has everyonein a tizzy. Will their strategy pay off?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 3
programme.desc: Things get testy when maniac Matt goes toe-to-tow with the Israelis on a container full of high end hunting equipment, and the bidding boils over when Jason tries to one-up them on a promising container from Japan.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 4
programme.desc: Manic Matt laughs hard when the others spend big money on what looks like junk, but when Matt bets his entire wallet on a container he thinks can make him rich, will he wind up the butt of the joke?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 5
programme.desc: Maniac Matt is out to prove a point in the port of Oakland. He gambles early on a container full of liquor, then drives up prices forcing everyone else to pony up.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 04
programme.desc: In his first outing as a Reserve Officer, Buzz finds a dead body in a hotel room, threatening, among other things, Flynn and Provenza's plans to take the squad to a baseball game.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 05
programme.desc: As the Major Crimes unit investigates a complicated gangland shooting, Detective Amy Sykes finds she must protect the identity of a witness capable of identifying the killer.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 06
programme.desc: The squad tries to identify a possible murder victim from his skeletal remains, only to find he may have a criminal past of his own. A new friend helps Rusty with the Alice case.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 07
programme.desc: After a shooting leaves two LA police officers dead, Major Crimes must work with Deputy Chief Fritz Howard (JON TENNEY) of the Special Operations Bureau to piece together the case.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 08
programme.desc: New information prompts the re-opening of an old investigation, forcing Captain Raydor and her Major Crimes division into partnership with a potentially corrupt FBI agent.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 1
programme.desc: Former boxer Brandon Bernier and his wife Lori target the best storage units in America and then to go to any lengths to get their hands on what's stashed inside.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 2
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go to war over a record producer's storage unit and unearth what could be a priceless piece of rock and roll history. Then, Jesse one ups the competition for a locker with a multi-thousand dollar payout. And later, a booby-trapped unit explodes, sending shockwaves through the storage facility.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 04
programme.desc: In his first outing as a Reserve Officer, Buzz finds a dead body in a hotel room, threatening, among other things, Flynn and Provenza's plans to take the squad to a baseball game.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 08
programme.desc: New information prompts the re-opening of an old investigation, forcing Captain Raydor and her Major Crimes division into partnership with a potentially corrupt FBI agent.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal and Q network their way into some very uncomfortable business conversations, and go head to head in a photography presentation that's anything but picture perfect. Then, the clock is ticking during a time sensitive challenge in the park. And finally, tonight's big loser thinks he can sing and dance his way out of his punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: The Jokers make some tough calls at a telemarketing agency that leave everyone wondering if they're just phoning it in. Then the guys' intentions get wishy-washy at a fountain in the mall. Plus, Q and Sal tap into their spiritual side when they catchsome dreams down at the shore. And the big loser of the night has his tour dampened by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr take to the court to serve up some seriously personal tennis lessons, and then head to the park for a bewildering game of Now! And tonight's loser must put his face through the ultimate test during a food presentation!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 10
programme.desc: Q, Murr, Sal, and Joe provide a false sense of security to some sassy shoppers at a drug store, and the competition reaches new heights during a rematch of their balloon challenge in the grocery store. And tonight the guys laugh and cry their way through the first ever permanent punishment!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: The guys cannonball into an uncomfortable poolside encounter, and convince strangers to press send on their absurd e-mails. Later, tonight's loser presents a shocking senior citizen initiative to a community planning board.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 1
programme.desc: Brace for impact - 20 of the world's dumbest adrenaline junkies are about to hit your screen! We've got a wannabe astronaut taking one giant leap off a roof, a girl who plays chicken with a bull, and a hot-air balloon wedding that hits the ground screaming. With spine-tingling commentary from our hilariously hardcore cast.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 11
programme.desc: At Michael's fireworks stand, he's got everything from exploding fruit to levitation sparklers. And at a Hemp store, Michael shows off his innovations in hemp technology. Plus, a time capsule completely blows one man's mind!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 12
programme.desc: Michael tries new foods like shape-shifting pasta and never-ending soup! Then it's off to a vinyl shop for a record-breaking illusion, and later, Michael tries to convince his coworker to explore a new plant.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 13
programme.desc: At a wilderness store, Michael reels in customers with an amazing new fishing tool, and at an AT&T store, Michael shows off a camera that's literally paper thin. Plus, a day of mini golf turns explosive when a loose cannon appears.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 14
programme.desc: Michael uncovers the secrets behind baoding balls, origami and paper lamps, and at Eataly, he reveals a spray that turns everything into bacon. Plus, a picture worth a thousand words leaves Michael's assistant speechless.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 15
programme.desc: Michael trains his coworkers how to hold a dog who can't hold it, and at the AT&T store, Michael shows off a new way to lighten the load. Plus, a man can vanish into a manhole, but the whole hole can't vanish, right?!

programme.desc: Bank Run - The younger Cartrights stage their robbery after Little Joe discovers bank owner, Harrison, plans to close the Virginia branch to claim insolvency. But the Cartrights themselves are robed en route home.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Fugitive - Will Reagen learns that his son Carl has died in Mexico. He asks Adam to return the body to Nevada for burial. Adam finds the own hostile and en route to Mexico, he meets a gunman who threatens his life.

programme.desc: Will the Real Mr. Howell Please Stand Up - Mr. Howell is furious when he learns that an imposter is spending his money.

programme.desc: Aunt Clara's Victoria Victory - Larry almost loses an important client when Aunt Clara conjures up Queen Victoria.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 Ep08
programme.desc: Moonshinin' Angels - The Angels are sent to Moonshine country in the Deep South to investigate problems between long-feuding bootlegging families, the Bartletts and the Catlins.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Vengeance - When Willie Twilight dies of a blow struck by Hoss in self-defense, he cannot forgive himself although everyone knows it was an accident. He goes off alone.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Tax Collector - A lazy Cartright neighbor, Jock Henry reluctantly accepts a job as tax assessor then lets authority and money go to his head. The Cartrights scheme to force Henry to quit his job.

programme.title: The Nanny S2 Ep09
programme.desc: When You Pish Upon A Star - With Maxwell slated to produce a revival of "Oliver", C.C. lines up a young television personality as its star. Though Maxwell balks at the idea, when Fran gets involved, he is worn down and agrees to hire Jack Walker.

programme.desc: The Theft of the Royal Ruby - Poirot reluctantly agrees to help an Egyptian prince recover a valuable royal ruby that was brazenly stolen from him during the Christmas holidays.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S7 Ep12

programme.desc: Peggy Sue Got Work - When Al refuses to buy Peggy a VCR, Marcy convinces her to get a job and buy one for herself.

programme.desc: The Affair at the Victory Ball - Poirot and Hastings attend the Victory Ball, a popular costume party. During the festivities, one of the guests is found stabbed to death, and another succumbs to a drug overdose the next day.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Ghost A Go Go - The castaways are haunted by a ghost. Richard Kiel guest star.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Crone of Cawdor - Unless Samantha can prevent Darrin from kissing a pretty girl, he will age five hundred years.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Silent Thunder - Little Joe Cartright tries teaching Ann Croft sign language and persuades her father, Sam to let her see a doctor. The good intention backfires when the girl falls in love with him.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 Ep14

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep1
programme.desc: It's 2016, and as CEO of NYL, Massimo Ruggero has brought Chinese investors onto the board and needs to win big on the Brexit referendum.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep2
programme.desc: As Massimo and his team vow to discover the truth behind Brexit's tragic aftermath, Dominic tries to stop NYL from acquiring a social media app.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep3
programme.desc: As Massimo's suspicions over Wu Zhi and Liwei grow, Oliver discovers that his chance of a future outside NYL has been sabotaged.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The battle lines are drawn between NYL and Dominic's new company - with former colleagues and friends pitted against one another.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep5
programme.desc: An accident outside a private Mayfair bank creates a once in a lifetime opportunity to discover the creator of Bitcoin.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Now knowing that he is a target, Massimo tires to retrieve the stolen evidence against him and creates a new plan to protect Europe and its citizens.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep7
programme.desc: In the final battle of the data war, Massimo has to finalise a new 5G deal with the EU and face the true threat to democracy.

programme.title: Devils S2 Ep8
programme.desc: After years in exile, Massimo sees the opportunity presented by the COVID-19 pandemic to finally get justice.

programme.title: Elsewhere
programme.desc: Still mourning the death of his wife, Bruno is hopelessly attached to the seaside cottage they built together. When he's evicted by his soulless in-laws, Bruno vows to get it back at any price.

programme.desc: A comedy about two estranged sisters brought back into each other's lives by the impending death of their grandmother.

programme.title: Canvas
programme.desc: A woman's schizophrenia affects her relationships with her husband and son.

programme.title: Operation: Neighborhood Watch!
programme.desc: When a new doctor moves in next door, the neighborhood kids believe that the doctor is making frankeinstein in his basement make it their mission to ensure he is not a creepy guardian of a terrible neighbor-eating monster.

programme.title: Swarmed
programme.desc: A small town decides to use a very potent and untested pesticide on yellow-jacket wasps plaguing the town However, the species has now mutated and is now stronger, more aggressive, hungrier and interested in LIVE human meat.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joanna travels the length of India, showing us delights like the flower-sellers of Madurai, before taking us back to Uzbekistan for gory tales and gem making.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep3
programme.desc: This episode looks at factories producing ice cream, tapenade, lollipops and Earl Grey tea.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep4
programme.desc: This episode looks at factories producing fruit sweets, chocolate malt balls, potato chips and chicken soup.

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep2
programme.desc: South America - In South America, Gordon flies over the Amazon in search of illegal loggers, and in the Andes he meets conservationists searching for new species before their habitat is destroyed.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Last Breath - Unable to breathe, Cyril is trapped underwater while on a mission to catch huge flat-headed beasts hiding in the murky snake and alligator-infested rivers of Texas and Mississippi. The only way to get to the 70lb flatheads is to go 30 feet deep, and catch them with his bare hands.

programme.title: Changing Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We begin the launch of the BBC's ambitious seven-year natural history project, in which six presenters visit six of the planet's most threatened ecosystems to meet the people fighting to restore the Earth's delicate balance. programme.title: Changing Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin travels to California to learn about the increasing wildfires. Ade Adepitan travels to Kenya to look at rising climate temperatures, and Gordon Buchanan is in Brazil looking for jaguars.

programme.desc: Bangladesh and Bhutan - In Bangladesh and Bhutan, Ade sees the damage that climate change is causing and finds out how we can fight it - and how a whole country can go carbon negative.

programme.desc: Greta sets off to the annual World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, which will be attended by world leaders, to call for action on climate change.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The New Wild - Mammals have mastered every environment on Earth, but today the planet is changing faster than ever. Mammals must change with it to have a chance of survival in this, the new wild.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep6
programme.desc: Azores - On Flores in the Azores, Ben meets a family who live off-grid in a cottage on a steep mountain.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joanna travels the length of India, showing us delights like the flower-sellers of Madurai, before taking us back to Uzbekistan for gory tales and gem making.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - God's Darling: Beetles Ep3
programme.desc: Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Change in the Air Ep3
programme.desc: Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Hunkering Down Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumns final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Seasons Ep12
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year and four seasons looks like for the wildest animals of Canadas East-Coast.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Berenty Dynasty Ep5
programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where its warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Change in the Air Ep3
programme.desc: Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - White Rhinos of Enasoit Ep3
programme.desc: The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 - Frida the Jaguar Cub Ep1
programme.desc: Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Fugitive Giants Ep4
programme.desc: With elephant numbers on the rise, so too are the conflicts Ol Pejeta has to deal with, like a gang of crop-raiding Pachyderms. The order is given to detusk three of the problem animals, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 - Koala Country Ep1
programme.desc: Despite being one of Australias best-known marsupials, koalas live only in the east and southeast parts of the continent. Learn how their lives and behaviors vary in these different regions.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Little Penguin Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Emu Ep2
programme.desc: The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil 1 - Meet the Devils Ep1
programme.desc: For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes, and learn about the violent, noisy etiquette of these carnivorous marsupials mealtime.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Icelands volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. Its an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. Theyre soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Tides of Sweetwater Ep5
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Koala 1 - Breeding Season Ep2
programme.desc: Koalas may seem solitary and inert, but mating season brings a dramatic shift in their behavior, leading to movement, contact, and conflict. As breeding season begins, follow two large males on a mission to mate.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Aerial Hunters Ep3
programme.desc: Australias birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australias aerial hunters.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Aerial Hunters Ep3
programme.desc: Australias birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australias aerial hunters.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Tasmanian Devil 1 - Young Devils Ep2
programme.desc: Tasmanian Devils might have the most infamous reputations of any of the countrys marsupials, but these spirited scrappers also have another side. Theyre committed parents and heroic defenders of their pouch-reared young.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean Ep5
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs Ep7
programme.desc: Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - March-April - a Time of Renewal Ep2
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep10
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck / Bonestand and Deliver - Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paws anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawstons 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Slippery Stage - Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep10
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep12
programme.desc: Venice the Menace - The Wanderers head to Venice to get a new cookie jar from Venice. Odlulu aims to become belle of the ball at the Venice Carnival but when she gets hold of the Crystal Glass Key, she turns the canals of Venice to glass. The Wanderers must get the key back and restore the city to normal.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets / Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Grug and Sandy get competitive when town members encroach on their treasure hunting/Gran convinces Grug that she controls the weather, but the power goes to her head when all of Ahhh! Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Uncle King - Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep13
programme.desc: Australian Blunder Down Under - When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep13

programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep39
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 1 - The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe, which worships dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep1
programme.desc: Wednesday - Just before her 15th Birthday. Princess Cleopatra is zapped thirty thousand years into the future where she discovers that she is the prophesied savior of the galaxy.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep2
programme.desc: Surprise - Cleo tries to find her place at the Academy, unaware that Akila is planning a surprise birthday party for her.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep51
programme.desc: All Good Things - Lotor returns to put an end to things once and for all

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep52

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep27
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Hughes - When Peabody and Sherman kill comedy in Ancient Greece, they team up with their alter egos to defeat a cyborg version of Mrs. Hughes and fix history

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep25
programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four - In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leader's goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." Once there they discover opposite versions of everyone they know from the real world, including a NICE Boris and Natasha!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep26
programme.desc: Amazamoose and Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Five - It all comes down to this! With anti-goop in hand from the opposite dimension, Rocky and Bullwinkle set out to take away Fearless Leaders super powers and save the world.
